reviews.review: Absolutely a great game, and is extremely terrifying. Gets my heart pumping everytime I play
Very good game !

At first, I had thought that I had made a mistake in getting this game. I'll admit, the graphics are dated, the multiplayer platform is horrendous, and the depth is a bit wanting, but after playing it for a bit.... I'm addicted!

Seriously, this game is pretty much balls to the wall Fun-As-HELL!!! 

Definitely give this game a shot, you'll be glad you did!

aber dem ist nicht so ! Die Maps überzeugen einfach. :3

Die Zombies selber sind einzigartig. Haben mehr persönlichkeit so wie die verdammt Fetten. :D
Das Geld ist es 100 % Wert! (Auch wenn ich persönlich bei einem Sale zugegriffen hab)

At least until Killing Floor 2 comes out anyway.

Istnieje pewna wojna między fanami Killing Floor a Left for Dead. Spory dotyczą głównie coopa, wielu twierdzi, że w L4D wygrywa pod tym względem, a jest tak zazwyczaj dlatego, że widzieli/grali runde w KF na łatwym lub średnim poziomie trudności. Na tych poziomach rzeczywiście współpraca nie jest kluczem do wygranej - każdy może poradzić sobie sam. Na wyższych poziomach już tak nie jest - przeciwnicy są bardziej agresywni. mają więcej życia i zadawają więcej obrażeń, my zaś zarabiamy mniej kasy na fajniejsze zabawki. I tu KF pokazuje swoje pradziwe oblicze tzn. oddal się trochę, a zginiesz. W teamie dobrze jest mieć medyka, strzelca wyborowego do zdejmowania Scrake'ów i Fleshpound'ów, na resztę dobry jest komandos - pod warunkiem, że gramy na niższych falach. Później robi się zdecydwanie trudniej i przydaje się umiejętność penetracji specjalisty wsparcia do zabijania kilku wrogów na raz. Dobrą klasą jest także berserker - oszczędzamy mnóstwo kasy na amunicji.
Dla mnie zdecydowanie Killing Floor wygrywa. Ta gra posiada niesamowity poje**** klimat, szczególnie uwielbiam tą muzykę lecącą w tle. Może i jest to tylko zwykła napie*dalanka do mutantów, ale system leveli i perków sprawia, że ta gra nie znudziła mnie tak szybko jak L4D. Co prawda Left posiada sporo ciekawych rodzajów misji, ale satysfakcja ze zdobycia 6 levelu obojętnie jakiego perka, zebranie kasy na potężniejsze bronie lub wygranie rundy podczas gdy zostałeś sam na ok. 100 mutantów albo patriarchę, jest po prostu świetna.

Игра отличная))

Откладываю деньги на KF 2)

Игра в принципе даже ничего , интересная , но она быстро надоедает !

Killing Floor is an FPS zombie Shooter.  It's generally a multiplayer game but the game let's you play solo by setting up a server where no other players can join, so effectively you get single player OR you can play with friends coop.  The game starts with you facing down the first wave of zombies.  During this wave, you must slowly find your way to the shop keeper so you can upgrade your gear (weapons, items, etc).  The shop keeper is somewhere on the map and there's an arrow in yur HUD pointing in the direction of the next shop.  If you clear a wave then a red trail appears showing you exactly where the shop is.  You can customize for more waves by selecting a longer game.  Each wave is kept track of in your HUD, with zombie and wave count.

There are items like guns and ammo available for pick up around the map.  The weapons available at the shop aren't bad but generally, if you've opted for the DLC then you have a bigger choice of weapons to use.  Weapons basically have a cumbersome/weight factor so you can't carry everything you want for each wave of zombies.  There are varrying zombies that do several things so depending on what you're facing might depend on what loadout you choose. When you have zombies firing missile launchers in your direction, you may opt for the body armor.

The graphics aren't bad for an old game... but it is an old game so you're dealing with an old graphics engine no matter how much DLC you add to your initial game.  There's several unique zombies and creatures that are pretty creative in their gore factor. Headshots have that slow motion action feel to them adding to the eye candy effect a bit.  There is quite a following of the game and there's even new DLC every so often that include maps and unique character sets with tons of achievements to farm for.  There's plenty of maps and the better you know the map, the better you play.  Incidentally, there's no mini-map so you REALLY have to know the map for longer survival and shop locations.  

My only real problem with the game is that you can't run.  If you're used to playing COD or some other FPS where you can just take up a sprint... not here.  The game will let you slow down to a walk though.  I'm assuming for better aim as you're moving and firing at the same time.  

I'm a fan of Tripwire games so this is right in there as a classic fave.  It's an old game but I'd still recommend it ON SALE... with the DLC on sale.  You can get multiple DLC packages and the game itself super cheap when there's a sale.  Looking forward to Killing Floor 2 for sure.

Игра очень интересная) Как в плане атмосферы, так и в плане геймплея и музыкального сопровождения) Еще игра понравилась тем, что играть интересно не только с друзьями, но и с другими людьми. Если с друзьями вы стараетесь держаться вместе чтобы в случае чего наложить в штаны всем вместе, то с другими игроками все наоброт) Им по фиг на тебя) Там каждый сам за себя! Была со мной одна ситуация, неприятная, и в то же время ржачная) Когда пошла предпоследняя волна зомби весь народ сбежал по ближе к центру и все дружно там заварили дверь) А я...остался на произвол судьбы! Как я долго бегал и матерился на них и на зомби) В то же время я и дико ржал) Когда кончилась волна у меня практически не осталось ХП, а про патроны я вобще молчу) Так что рекомендую всем и каждому!) Всем приятной игры.

Итак,что такое Killing Floor ? Разложим по полочкам.
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]+Геймплей[/th]
        [th]Играть можно часами,убивать можно тысячами,перестать играть уже нельзя.[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]+Противники[/td]
        [td]Тут не будет эльфов,гномиков,грибочков и прочего го*на.Тут будут бешеные твари с мясодробилками и бензопилой вместо рук.Тут будут гибриды человека и паука,и это не тот клоун в разноцветном трико из комиксов,это кое-что во много раз хуже...[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]+Саундтрек[/td]
        [td]Стирать с лица Земли тонны тварей под ядрёную долбёжку - бесценно,поверьте мне.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]+Контент[/td]
        [td]Да,по сути Killing Floor похожа на десятки таких же игр с таким же режимом (Взять тот же Team Fortress 2 Mann vs Machines,один в один),но что-то такое особенное тут есть.Режима всего 2:Убей или Сделай.Редко но метко разработчики добавляют контент в игру (Карты,оружия,скины,режим),а вот в Мастерской Стима творится что-то непонятное:Каким солёным х*ем Killing Floor связана с какими-то уссавшимися анимешечками ? Неизвестно. [/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

This is a well done game with great weapon handling. It doesn't pretend to be more than it is, so don't come into it expecting much depth or an extreme amount of variety. It's a depthless shoot'em'up peppered with flavor in the form of both classes and different weapon loadouts, but what it isn't is revolutionary or extraordinarily difficult. Many times the solutions to winning on different maps are quite formulaic, but there is always room to mess around as you wish. By no means do you have to follow any specific strategy at all times, but there is definitely a "best" strategy and class to each map.

Games can get quite repetitive once you've put a couple dozens of hours into it, but only if Killing Floor is the only game you're playing for the entire period. Great pick up and go game to play with friends, during downtime, or between other games. Definitely of my better go-to games when I'm just looking to relax or kill time.

Cheap, fun, worth it if you like shooters/"zombie" games

Killing Floor is probably one of the best games of all time
I will just break down the reasons why i think that is:

- Teamwork: Teamwork in this game is so important, it is the reason why you (and hopefully your team) can win. 
    In fact, being selfish is more or so going to get you punished.
- The leveling system: The perks in Killing Floor are quite unique, why you might ask? Well thats becuase they have 
     a leveling system. Each level you gain is going to boost your stats, an example would be the Field medic: With each 
     level you will heal people for more or gain more movements speed all of wich will benefit you troughout the game.  
     
- The community: Killing Floor has one of the strongest and most productive communities out there, there are thousands        of videos on youtube that gives others information about varius things like "How to stun a scrake", "Kill Flesh Pounds in seconds" and top it of: There is always someone playing out there, wether its 2 am. or 9 pm. there is always someone playing

This review is already long enough so i will just sum it up:
Killing Floor is one of the best and most addictive games out there and would recommend everybody to pick it up and try it

A very nice shoot'em till they stop movin game.

You are a surviver who either works alone (very difficult) or in a team.
Your mission; Kill everything they throw at you.
A normal game consists of 10 waves of enemys, this becomes increasingly difficult with specials joining the fun at around the third wave. A wide variety of weapons is at your disposal to achieve the 11th wave, the boss.
During this last round you try to take out the scientist that "started this mess".

Very fun game, can be difficult at times, mostly due to teammates not working together.
You need to be able to play with others!

Great zombie survival multiplayer game. Definitely pick it up when it´s on sale ( which is very often ).

Muy divertido y entretenido,este juego es sangriento,muy necesario si te gusta el gore,por no hablar de que a mi mas de una vez me a servido para deshacerme de la tension despues de un mal dia,cooperativo,aunque no precisamente barato,pero lo que si que tiene es la workshop,asi que aparte de los mapas de tripwire,tienes los creados por jugadores,mas nuevas armas o simplemente unas skins para las ya existentes.Si tienes 20 pavos de sobra aprovecha y compralo!

Perhaps the best zombie co-op of all time. 

Miles above the rest because it gets everything right, and that's essential for a great game. 

You will feel genuine fear on this game, knowing that all your team mates have just been eaten alive and you are one of the only ones left running for your life - this is where skill kicks in and seperates the noobs from the pros.

Personally I've never gotten bored of this and have returned time after time, effectually it's a modernised, up-to-date Doom, there are many comparable elements. 

New content is released all the time (usually seasonally) and still years in the game hosts thousands of regular players.

There is also a lot to do in terms of benchmarking via achivements, which are extensive and will take months to procure honestly. 

Bit of a classic this and worth it's place in any gamers collection. My most played game on steam as it goes

Très très bon FPS, quel plaisir de tuer du zombies, en multijoueurs ! On peut arriver jusqu'à 40 joueurs en même temps sur un serveur grâce aux mods ! Parcourir ce jeu avec des potes et encore plus génial, fous rires assurés. Le gameplay est basique, mais petite particularité, aucun réticule, mais il reste aisé de tuer du zombie ! Les graphismes sont plus que raisonnables, les développeurs se donnent beaucoup de mal pour mettre à jour leur jeu, ajouter des nouvelles armes, ce jeu ne se laisse pas aller, par rapport à certains. Il y a énormément de maps, que ce soit les officielles ou les maps customs, elle sont pour la plupart très grandes, et sympa à parcourir. Je le préfère à la concurrence "L4D/2". A acheter !Sans compter que j'ai eut le tout à 8€ avec tout les DLC !

[h1]Killing Floor[/h1]
[b]If you like a large amount of explosions, flying legs and arms This game is for you !
I am gonna describe it quickly and accurately.[/b]

Pros.
+ Very good soundtrack. \m/
+ Perks system.
+ Workshop Steam.
+ Lots of weapons, character skins and maps.
+ Interesting opponents.
+ Events ( Holiday, Christmas, Halloween )

Cons
- Too much DLC.
- The game has already some years.
- Some bugs on maps.

[b]The final decision to say the game is very good !!! 
Strong 8/10[/b]

Il problema di questo gioco è la ripetività di certe situazioni (vedi il boss finale) ma regala sempre grandi emozioni soprattutto se giocato in coop con amici.
